attributes.action: Give ALL NHS & Ambulance service staff pay rises for their exceptional hard work
attributes.additional_details: Recognise ALL key workers for their hard work during the pandemic!
attributes.background: Recognise all NHS and Ambulance service staff for their hard work during the Coronavirus Pandemic and not just doctors. Doctors are an important role in the Health service but nurses, doctors, domestics and ward clerks and all other staff are the backbone to the NHS and need to be recognised more.
